charges.charge_disposition: Defendant plead guilty to count1. Defendant sentenced to 48 months imprisonment. Defendant should be considered as a candidate for the Intensive Confinement Program. Supervised release for a term of 1 year. Standard conditions of supervision apply. Special conditions of supervision: defendant shall not possess a firearm or other dangerous weapon, defendant shall undergo substance abuse treatment; defendant shall not commit any federal state or local crime; within 72 hours of release from the Bureau of Prisons the defendant shall report to Probation. Specail Assessment of 100.00 imposed (1)
